message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested in the product, but $100 is a bit more than I'm looking to spend. Would you be willing to come down to $90?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I'm not quite ready to go down to $90 yet. How about we meet in the middle at $95?
